title: SP4 "One Piece Historical Drama Series: Luffy's Detective Story"[4]"One Piece: End-of-Year Special Plan! Chief Straw Hat Luffy's Detective Story"Transliteration: "Wan Pīsu: Nenmatsu Tokubetsu Kikaku! Mugiwara no Rufi Oyabun Torimonochō" (Japanese:ワンピース年末特別企画!麦わらのルフィ親分捕物帖) Unknown Unknown December 18, 2005(2005-12-18)[6] 42 minutes
transformers_text:
SP4 "One Piece Historical Drama Series: Luffy's Detective Story"[4]"One Piece: End-of-Year Special Plan! Chief Straw Hat Luffy's Detective Story"Transliteration: "Wan Pīsu: Nenmatsu Tokubetsu Kikaku! Mugiwara no Rufi Oyabun Torimonochō" (Japanese:ワンピース年末特別企画!麦わらのルフィ親分捕物帖) Unknown Unknown December 18, 2005(2005-12-18)[6] 42 minutes

Buggy and his "Clown Family" are causing havoc in Feudal Era Grand Line. They've kidnapped Onami (Nami) and it's up to Luffy, Usopp and Sanji to save her. After a failed attempt by the Buggy Family they try to capture Princess Vivi, only to fail again and be defeated by Zoro and Luffy.
